documents.document: RT @LifeLimits: Sometimes you gotta create what you want to be a part of.
One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others. -Levi Strauss
RT @FaithReeI: https://t.co/LVT9R0lqxg
You cannot always wait for the perfect time. Sometimes you must dare to jump.
Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
In the right light, at the right time, everything is extraordinary. - Aaron Rose
RT @AmazingiGrace: The Lord's word is pure - Psalm 18:30.
Money is the wealthy man's curtain which hides all his defects from the world.
We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. - Winston Churchill
Live in the moment. Forget the past and don't concern yourself with the future.
RT @LovLikeJesus: God enters by a private door into each individual. -Ralph Waldo Emerson
Every scar has a story. Don't be afraid to tell it.
If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem. - Richard Bach
Strength is when you have so much to cry for but you prefer to smile instead.
Don't cheat the world of your contribution. Give it what you've got. -Steven Pressfield
When you truly believe in what you are doing, it shows. And it pays. Winners in life are those who are excited about where they're going.
All a girl really wants is for one guy to prove to her that they are not all the same. -Marilyn Monroe
If you can't be thankful for what you have, be thankful for what you've escaped.
That would be a great trick :) https://t.co/NMMbR7BDCl
RT @lnspireMeNow: Learn from it. https://t.co/P46CRBfgOe
I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter. - Walt Disney
Adversity causes some men to break, and others to break records. -Unknown
Stars can't shine without darkness.

You are made to make a difference, so embrace every opportunity to do so.
Surround yourself with positive people who will support you when it rains, not just when it shines.
RT @desire_lnspire: Be brave https://t.co/XHKP7pYVkN
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today. -Abraham Lincoln
God can turn around any situation.
Don't be afraid to go out on a limb. That's where the fruit is. - H. Jackson Browne
Great thought. https://t.co/Z2WueNae5q
Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do. -Johann Von Goethe
RT @AmazingiGrace: Worry about nothing, pray about everything. https://t.co/t9RxNhN1zr
Can you relate? https://t.co/WDrwHIzfk1
If someone wants you, nothing will keep them away, but if they don't want you, nothing will make them stay!
If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it. It's the hard that makes it great. -Tom Hanks
We can't become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
Learn to give without any reason.
The moment you're ready to quit is usually the moment right before the miracle happens.
Smile, even if it's fake. Laugh, even if you hurt. Don't let anyone get to you, you're beautiful regardless of what anyone says to you.
RT @sports_grit: Accept responsibility for the good and the bad. https://t.co/LRSCEk1ibe
Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.

You never lose by loving. You only lose by holding back.
Age is no guarantee of maturity. -Lawana Blackwell
RT @lnspiredLife: Go after your dreams. https://t.co/u8Yzw7MfPR
Behind me is infinite power, before me is endless possibility, around me is boundless opportunity. - Author Unknown
Even fools seem smart when they are quiet. -Proverbs 17:28
Reality is a product of our dreams, decisions & actions
RT @lnspiredLife: So true!!! https://t.co/each2zUeuz
We cannot become what we need to be by remaining what we are. -Max De Pree
The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least. - Unknown
God's plan is bigger than your mistakes.
Be strong https://t.co/ShDWmK4cgF
Laugh your heart out, dance in the rain, cherish the moment, live, laugh, love, forgive & forget, life's 2 short 2 be, living w/ regrets.
It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart. -Winnie the Pooh
If you can't do great big things, do great little things.
I began learning long ago that those who are happiest are those who do the most for others. - Booker T. Washington
Danger 4 most of us lies not in setting our aim too high & falling short; but in setting our aim 2 low &achieving our mark. -Michaelangelo
RT @AthletesWhoPray: Give all the glory to God. https://t.co/d9rpdKsPE7

May you always do what you are afraid to do.
Looking back, makes you smart. Looking forward, makes you mature. Looking down, makes you wise. Looking UP, makes you strong.
